title: Siren

properties.name: description
properties.value: Sirens are a species of aquatic beings native to the Eastern Lands. They are closely related to mermaids, and are known for their singing voices, which have powers to lure sailors to their deaths and control the sea monsters native to the east. They are generally a peaceful race, but certain Sirens, such as Shura, are part of a warrior class.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Siren
Shura, the only siren currently in-game.

Sirens are a species of aquatic beings native to the Eastern Lands. They are closely related to mermaids, and are known for their singing voices, which have powers to lure sailors to their deaths and control the sea monsters native to the east. They are generally a peaceful race, but certain Sirens, such as Shura, are part of a warrior class.

Known sirens include:

  • Shura
rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
[[File:The Nightmare of Ashihama Poll Blog (2).gif|120px|right|thumb|Shura, the only siren currently in-game.]]
'''Sirens''' are a species of aquatic beings native to the [[Eastern Lands]]. They are closely related to [[mermaid]]s, and are known for their singing voices, which have powers to lure sailors to their deaths and control the sea monsters native to the east. They are generally a peaceful race, but certain Sirens, such as Shura, are part of a warrior class. 

Known sirens include:
* [[Shura]]

[[Category:Races]]
